# Sylvain Jaume 2008

project(libiconv)

add_definitions(-DHAVE_CONFIG_H -DHAVE_STRING_H)

include_directories(
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}
  extras
  include
  lib
  libcharset
  srclib
  windows)

set(SOURCES
  extras/iconv_string.c
  lib/genaliases.c
  lib/genaliases2.c
  #lib/genflags.c
  lib/gentranslit.c
  lib/iconv.c
  lib/relocatable.c
  libcharset/lib/localcharset.c
  libcharset/lib/relocatable.c
  libcharset/tools/locale_charset.c

  #libcharset/tools/locale_x11encoding.c
  src/iconv.c
  #src/iconv_no_i18n.c

  srclib/error.c
  srclib/memmove.c
  srclib/progname.c
  #srclib/progreloc.c
  srclib/readlink.c
  srclib/relocatable.c
  #srclib/relocwrapper.c
  srclib/setenv.c
  srclib/strerror.c
  srclib/unsetenv.c
  #srclib/width.c
  srclib/xmalloc.c
  #srclib/xreadlink.c
  srclib/xstrdup.c
  #tests/gengb18030z.c
  #tests/genutf8.c
  #tests/table-from.c
  #tests/table-to.c
  #tests/uniq-u.c
  tools/8bit_tab_to_h.c
  tools/cjk_tab_to_h.c
  tools/cjk_variants.c)
  #woe32dll/iconv-exports.c)

add_library(libiconv STATIC ${HEADERS} ${SOURCES})
